edu.uab.ssg.io.marchini_gwas

Class LegendBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uab.ssg.io.marchini_gwas.LegendBuilder

  • public final class LegendBuilder
extends Object
    A builder for Legend implementations.
    Author:
    Jelai Wang

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LegendBuilder()
      Constructs the builder.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void countAllele(SNP snp, String allele)
      Counts an allele at a SNP.
      Legend createMinorAlleleLegend()
      Creates legend that recodes alleles to 0 or 1 based on the minor allele.
      Legend createReferenceSampleLegend(Sample referenceSample)
      Creates legend that recodes alleles to 0 or 1 based on the haplotype of a given reference sample.
      Set<String> getAllelesForBadSNP(SNP badsnp)
      For a SNP that is not monomorphic or biallelic, return the set of observed alleles for troubleshooting purposes.
      List<SNP> getBadSNPs()
      Returns a list of SNPs that are not monomorphic or biallelic.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LegendBuilder

        public LegendBuilder()
        Constructs the builder.

    • Method Detail

      • countAllele

        public void countAllele(SNP snp,
                        String allele)
        Counts an allele at a SNP. The set of alleles observed at a SNP determines how the alleles are recoded to 0 or 1 in the legend.

      • createMinorAlleleLegend

        public Legend createMinorAlleleLegend()
        Creates legend that recodes alleles to 0 or 1 based on the minor allele.

      • createReferenceSampleLegend

        public Legend createReferenceSampleLegend(Sample referenceSample)
        Creates legend that recodes alleles to 0 or 1 based on the haplotype of a given reference sample.

      • getBadSNPs

        public List<SNP> getBadSNPs()
        Returns a list of SNPs that are not monomorphic or biallelic. These SNPs are not part of the legend because the recoding of alleles to 0 or 1 is only defined for monomorphic or biallelic SNPs.

      • getAllelesForBadSNP

        public Set<String> getAllelesForBadSNP(SNP badsnp)
        For a SNP that is not monomorphic or biallelic, return the set of observed alleles for troubleshooting purposes.
